nl: Let $X$ be completely regular. Show that $X$ is connected if and only if the Stone-Čech compactification of $X$ is connected.
lean:
∀ {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [CompletelyRegularSpace X] :
  IsConnected (univ : Set X) ↔ IsConnected (univ, Set (StoneCech X))
imports:
import Mathlib

open Filter Set TopologicalSpace
open scoped Topology
